---
title: "Requirements"
---

For this course you will need the following setup if you want to work on your local machine:

- **Python**: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment `mr` and Visual Studio Code
- **Environment**: HuggingFace API key; OpenAI API and an environment file with your APIs

:::{.callout-important}
Visit the "[Programming Toolkit-webpage](https://kirenz.github.io/lab-toolkit/)" to learn how to meet all requirements.
:::
